titleStmt.title: Oedipus three cantoes. VVherein is contained: 1 His vnfortunate infancy. 2 His execrable actions. 3 His lamentable end. By T.E. Bach: Art. Cantab.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Thomas, d. 1633.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
